Good news: You survived!

As the last surviving medic, the faith of mankind lies in your hands. Or, something like that.

FEATURES


  • Jump, double-jump, jet, dash, and fast-fall (in any order). Your jetpack has a limited range, but it resets when you land on solid ground.
  • Explore 150+ levels across 14 different planets, each with their own unique visual and musical themes.
  • Quickly retry levels when you die, thanks to a multi-checkpoint system.
  • Enjoy a variety of originally composed music. You'll rarely hear the same tune twice.
  • Pilot a submarine-like personal craft through a handful of underwater levels.
  • Fly a hoverboard on one of the planets.
  • Discover various secrets and Easter eggs scattered throughout the galaxy.
  • Jump straight into the action! There's no hand-holding, no dialog, and no long text to read. The story is implied by the environment.

item.title: Christmas: Dark Side
item.description:
About This Game

Have you ever wondered what those Christmas glass balls are really hiding?
But I know..! And this Christmas story is not as usual. Yes, there is the Santa Claus, his reindeer and gifts for children. But these are not at all the gifts that a child expects for Christmas. And you can’t even imagine what awaits you that night!
Have you ever pissed on snowmen and elves? Or fed poisoned popcorn to the deer? I'm sure not! And it’s unlikely that you went down into a cursed dungeon with ghosts to find gifts and the treasured key to the chest!

Waiting for you:
- Search and sort items
- Explore the dungeon
- Interact with Christmas creatures
- Launch Santa to the moon
- And lots of funny moments

item.title: Master Manager
item.description:
About This Game

You are the manager of a football club, determine its future by making the best decisions regarding tactics, training, player contracts, sponsorship deals and infrastructure.

Start at the 4th division, use your management skills to fight your way up to the top.

All CPU matches are actually played, there is no made up result.

Watch your players performing on our amazing 2D match engine.

FEATURES


  • STRATEGY: Decide the best strategy for your club by choosing from 50 different formations and setting up individual instructions and team instructions.
  • TRAINING: hire training staff, train your players in one of the 30 different attributes and manage players condition, morale and fitness to get the best of them;
  • FINANCES: Manage player contracts, accept sponsorship deals and loans.
  • TRANSFER MARKET: Put the players you don’t like up for sale, and buy players who best fit your goals.
  • DEVELOPMENT: Expand your stadium, upgrade gym, training ground and recovery center.

item.title: Just Xiangqi
item.description:
About This Game

The most exquisite and stunning Chinese Chess (Xiangqi or elephant chess) game ever made!

Chinese Chess is one of the three major types of chess in the world, and is played with red and black round pieces on a square board. It simulates an ancient battle between two armies on a dynamic battlefield, in which the opponent's general is captured to achieve ultimate victory.

Game Features

  • Extensive career mode with large tournaments, single/team matches, prize pools and more
  • Realistic 4K visual spectacle
  • A detailed audio tutorial to help newcomers gain experience and enjoy the game
  • Various AI difficulty levels for both beginners and advanced players
  • Mid-game, endgame, and famous match challenges to test yourself with
  • Freely switch between online and local matches
  • Relive famous historical matches
  • Online ranking and global leaderboards

item.title: Manor Madness
item.description:
About This Game

Manor Madness is a 3D, third-person sandbox game. In this game, you play a young ghost, Ghustav, who wants to learn how to become a real poltergeist.

As a ghost, you can possess, throw, and interact with different objects around the house. Observe each visitor carefully to understand their fears and exploit them to make the humans’ blood run cold.

Ghustav attends Polterhigh, the most prestigious school for poltergeisting. In the course Manor Madness, you will learn what it means to be a poltergeist and what abilities are at your disposal. In each assignment, your goal is to scare all the humans out of your assigned manor.

Currently on sale, the manor is frequented by humans interested in buying the building and a realtor trying his best to sell the house. He needs to get creative in finding excuses for your spooky shenanigans. The realtor has a soothing effect on the other humans in the room. Distract him to maximize your scariness.

Will you merely be able to send a shiver down their spine, or will you succeed in scaring their pants off? Your class starts now!

Key Features


Possess and interact with different objects
Every room in your manor is equipped with unique objects for you to discover.
  • Possess different objects and throw them across the room
  • Interact with objects, flicker the light switch, or play an eerie melody on the piano

Polter Sense
Tap into your ghostly senses and see beyond the mortal realm.
Use your Polter Sense to discover all the objects you can use.

item.title: CrossNotes
item.description:
About This Game

Game type

Strategy Role Playing Game

Story background

Due to the intervention of different external energies, there is a cross phenomenon between various spatial planes.
Heroes from different worlds have come to your world.
This is the story of your adventure with outsiders.

Core gameplay

This is a Japanese Q-version style battle chess game. The choice of action for each character is the key to your victory. Under your command, fight to the death with the enemy.

Game features

A large number of rich, cute, and interesting characters
■ Clearly differentiated character and unit positioning Rich level gameplay
■ High degree of process freedom

Character preview

Battle action diagram

item.title: Spellbound Hearts
item.description:
About This Game


"Spellbound Hearts" is a visual novel game that follows the story of Lycos, a vampire trapped in a desolate castle by a powerful spell. Alone and haunted by memories, Lycos encounters Zephyros, a young wizard who enters his domain seeking a drop of his blood to save his village from a plague. As their paths intertwine, Lycos and Zephyros embark on a journey of trust, redemption, and love. Guided by their pasts and a shared purpose, they work together to break the curse binding Lycos and to save Zephyros's village.

item.title: ByteBurst: Hacking Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

"ByteBurst" invites you to an exhilarating action and strategy adventure, delving into the mysterious world of computer hacking. Transition from an ordinary computer user to navigating the dark corners of the digital kingdom in this thrilling game.

Key Features:

  • Hack and Defend: Infiltrate the depths of the digital world by solving challenging puzzles and bypassing security systems. Strengthen your own systems and devise defense strategies against attacks from other players.

  • Advanced Hacker Tools: Master the command prompt, tackle complex SQL injectors, and seize your targets using remote control tools. Win the information warfare with brute-force software and log cleaners.

  • Cyber Space Competitions: Compete with other players and participate in cyber space competitions to climb the rankings. Engage in battles with rivals as you strive to become the ultimate hacker.

item.title: Escape Space
item.description:
About This Game

3 DIFFERENT FACTIONS

As a mercenary, you'll get to decide for which faction(s) you're willing to fight. Your actions will have consequences, so choose wisely!

The Earth Military Conglomerate: the Earth's military faction. They usually have big guns and tend to use ballistic-based weapons when in combat.



The Void Outlaws: the renegade faction in space. They use weird tactics in combat with a wide variety of weapons, depending on what they might have stolen.



The Quantum Riders: the cult of scientists focusing on new technology. They usually have high-end energy weapons and shields at their disposal.

22 STORY MISSIONS

You'll get to play up to 12 different story missions in a single run, but there are 3 different paths you can take from the beginning to discover all of the 22 handcrafted story missions!

ENDLESS PROCEDURAL CONTRACTS

Between two story missions, you'll be able to grind for money or reputation by doing procedurally-generated contracts for the factions you wanna play with.

7 GAME MODES

There are up to 7 different mission types in the game, and you'll get to unlock them all the more you progress through the storyline.

  • The Elimination missions: go through some waves on enemies until you reach the priority target and hunt it down!
  • The Collect missions: fight waves of enemies until you gather enough of the requested component from their scrap!
  • The Escort missions: help an allied and defenseless unit to go through a space sector by destroying any enemy target in front of you!
  • The Warfare missions: get involved in a conflict between two factions and get some reinforcement from the faction that requested some help!
  • The Rush missions: assault an enemy faction's position and go through their defenses while destroying all of their units!
  • The Survival missions: fight enemy waves for a set time, and decide if you want to continue and earn more rewards by destroying more of them!
  • The Mayhem missions: target a fleet concentrating numerous elite enemies and take them all down!

5 DIFFICULTIES

Even if the story missions' difficulty is set and cannot be changed, you'll be able to play the procedurally-generated contract missions based on their difficulty. The more difficult they are, the higher the risks and rewards will be!



Having trouble with higher difficulties? Maybe it's time to grind lower-difficulty contracts to get some new gear and upgrades!

17 WEAPONS

You'll start to play with the default Firestorm machine gun unlocked, and then be able to expand your arsenal with gifted or purchased weapons!

12 MODS

Starting without any mod, you'll be able to get new perks by unlocking and selecting new mods! From a passive energy shield to an active E.M.P. system, test and decide what mod works best for you!

18 COLORS

Who said you cannot be classy in space? You can decide on your spaceship's colors using 18 different colors, on two layers (primary and secondary). Plus, you can also decide what the color of your thruster's exhaust is!

45 UPGRADES

In addition to the customization, you'll be able to constantly improve your spaceship by getting new upgrades until you get them all! Plan to unlock the most relevant ones for your playstyle first and dominate your enemies!

BEAUTIFUL HANDCRAFTED PIXEL ART

All of the in-game assets are hand-made with pixel art by myself, hope you'll enjoy them!

AN AMAZING OST

We teamed up with the very talented Scott Hsu who made this incredible OST for Escape Space!

item.title: Omurice Next Time
item.description:
About This Game


On an unhurried day, find a cozy spot, get comfortable, set the mood for wholesome, and open this unique interactive storybook.

In Windreach, in a small apartment top floor, lived Finn and Gray, my favorite couple. Life is simple, perhaps a bit ordinary, and that is good.

Finn opens a sweets shop, and Gray is a truck driver. They don't have much, but luckily there is always food on the table. No matter what happens, they got each other.

Made with Love

A heartwarming experience inspired by personal life.

Sit Back and Relax

There are no pressures, and you don't have to accomplish anything. Just like what life is supposed to be.

Light Comedy

The story is fun and filled with joy. Perhaps a bit silly sometimes. Not too much, just enough to bring a smile to your face.

Relentlessly Gay

And I am proud of it! The next update will be even gayer.

Bigger on the Inside

What is it? Tap, drag, and press! It is a book you can both read and play.




On the occasion of my work being published, please allow me to introduce myself.

My name is Griffin Cyan, the author of this game. My avatar resembles me in real life.

The story of Omurice Next Time is deeply personal. The inspiration was drawn from my day-to-day life. I am more like Finn, and my boyfriend Garrett is basically Gray. It is a love letter, a memoir, and a vision.

There is always beauty in ordinary life. Love is long and lasting, kind of like mochi in soup.
To you, my dear readers, I sincerely hope you can find joy, peace, and strength in it.

item.title: Dodecadone
item.description:
About This Game

28 traits, tons of shapes

Press space for a triangle, one of many variety.

That shape might be
  • Bouncy
  • Spinning
  • Racist
  • Protesting gravity
  • Sick
  • Or one of many others...

Your task is to gather them all, make sense of it, and merge your geometric friends and foes to a square. Then, a pentagon, a septagon, a hexagon...

Many others, then... you're dodecadone.


Features

  • Full modding support- anything from new traits to entirely new games!
  • 9 Unique themes, including full transparency
  • Custom themes with CSS
  • Cheats menu
  • Scoring system & speedrunning timer
  • Practically every language ever via automatic translation
  • Silly english for the goofsters
  • 100% free, only with donations. Open-source under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0.

item.title: DOOL
item.description:
About This Game

This is a simple rule puzzle game. The goal is to destroy all cubes on the stage to win.

First, select a cube and choose another cube of the same color on the same line. If there are no obstacles along the path between the two cubes, they will collide and be destroyed.

Different colored cubes can act as obstacles to each other, and you need to overcome various obstacles, such as barrier cubes, to achieve the objective.

There are 49 stages prepared, and clearing them will require many attempts and strategic thinking.

item.title: ANGEL WHISPER - The Suspense Visual Novel Left Behind by a Game Creator.
item.description:
About This Game

[Video Letter from Mirai] (Voice Actor: Ai Shimizu)
This is more than just a video game trailer; it's a personal plea to you.
Due to circumstances, I am making this request alongside the release of the game.
Would you play this video game until the very end?
In 1999, my father, game designer Hiroaki Yushima, abruptly vanished from our lives, leaving behind a single video game.
"ANGEL WHISPER"... this is that video game.

Please, I need your help.
Will you uncover the truth... on my behalf?


[Remake]
・Completely refreshed graphics, including characters and stills.
・Added an epilogue and hints for 2023. Designed for anyone to play to the end.
・Music provided from "epitaph" by composer H.Oshima. Also, remastered the original's popular BGM.
・Added a fortune-telling system by the original's popular character, the fortune-teller Laisa.


[From the Creator]
This game, in 2023, was refined at the request of my friend's daughter, Mise Yushima.

The truth behind the disappearance of the original creator, Hiroaki Yushima, remains unclear to this day. No suicide note or clues were left behind, only this game, "ANGEL WHISPER."
The creators cannot be held responsible for any events that may occur as a result of playing this video game.

[Story]
"Why did he leave behind this game and disappear?"

Game creator Yushima suddenly vanished from this world, and the only thing left behind was a single game, "ANGEL WHISPER."

The content depicted in the posthumous work was an event Yushima experienced in 1998. He joined a certain game company and began producing a game based on Nostradamus's prophecy of the end of the world. However, in the midst of production, a mysterious incident occurred, and he lost his colleagues.

Within the game, the protagonist Yushima, while advancing development at the game company, chases after the mystery of the incident. Soon, Yushima confronts an inexplicable entity.

What was Yushima pursuing, and what kind of incident did he get entangled in? Why did he leave behind this work? Play until the end, and discover his final intentions.

item.title: Project Astra Dominium
item.description:
About This Game

Project Astra Dominium is a Tower Defense game with Basebuilding and Automation elements.



Explore different planets and defend against a mysterious alien race, that seem to reproduce endlessly and eat up whole planets.



Make use of the latest Nanite technology to process and refine all resources you find into useful materials for earth or new equipment for your towers.



As an AI you learn from everything you do and become stronger and better.
  • Gain combat experience and skillpoints that you can use to improve your towers. Each tower has it's own skilltree with up to 250 points to spend!
  • Learn recipes to craft various materials, items and also equipment for your towers.
  • Improve your crafting abilities and effiency to use less resources while having
    more/better/faster output.
  • Discover more about the aliens and learn to craft special beacons, that attract much stronger species that may also yield much better rewards!
  • Expand and improve your base to become a reliable resource hub for earth.


It's the year 2249, most resources on earth are nearly depleted and have lead to many conflicts in the past.
Despite those crises, humanity made huge progress in the fields of AI, which in turn allowed for enormous advances in space travel.
Scientists were even able to create a new kind of engine, which made it possible to travel faster than light. But on the downside humans were not able to survive this way of transportation.
In a last desperate attempt and in search for new resources, the EIRO (European Interstellar Resource Organization) built a brand new ship which was only controlled by an AI named "Athena".
Hoping that the AI can survive the jump and begin autonomous exploration and exploitation of resources, the ship is launched into an unknown future...

item.title: Unsung Empires: The Cholas
item.description:
About This Game



In this single-player, narrative-driven 3D action game, you will take on the role of Rajendra Chola, one of the most powerful kings of Tamil Nadu. You will experience the rich lore of the Chola dynasty within this prologue. Fight your way as Rajendra Chola with swords, engage in melee combat, and use stealth to overcome hostile enemies. Your journey will traverse different environments of Srivijaya, such as its forests, cities, caves, and wilderness. These elements will advance the game’s story. The prologue follows his journey of overseas conquest, where the Chola Navy crossed the ocean and launched an attack on the Srivijaya kingdom of Sangrama Vijayatungavarman.

Prologue Part 1 releasing on 15th January 2024!


We are releasing “Unsung Empires: The Cholas Prologue 1” which drops on January 15, 2024. Building on that, we've got Part 2 coming your way in March of the same year.

Enjoy Beautifully-Crafted Graphics, Authentic Music, and Detailed Environments


Marvel at the beautifully crafted graphics that bring ancient India to life with realistic lighting, shadows, and textures. Listen to authentic music that captures the mood and spirit of each scene. Experience detailed environments that are filled with ambient sounds, dynamic weather effects, and wildlife.

Wield Your Sword and Master Powerful Combat Techniques


Fight your way through a world of danger and intrigue using swords/bows and stealthy maneuvers—master powerful combat techniques inspired by ancient Tamil martial arts. Face off against hostile enemies, including the Sri Vijaya soldiers who will stop at nothing to defend their king.

Experience a Compelling Story


Embark on an Epic Journey of Conquest and Adventure Step into the shoes of Rajendra Chola, the warrior king of the Chola Empire, as he faces his greatest challenge yet. The Srivijaya king Sangrama has blocked his trade route and threatened his sovereignty, and he must teach him a lesson he will never forget. Along the way, he will meet allies, enemies, friends, & foes and discover secrets and mysteries that will change his destiny. Will he restore the glory of his empire, or will he pay a heavy price for his ambition?

A Taste Of What’s to Come


This game will span over 10 chapters, telling a different story that we haven’t revealed yet. This pilot chapter is a prologue that covers the Srivijaya empire, where Rajendra Chola sets out to teach a lesson to the Srivijaya king Sangrama. This chapter will set the stage for the main game, which will take you to a different time and place. You will get to explore more of the rich and diverse culture of the Cholas and Tamil and experience more thrilling and immersive gameplay. We’re giving this pilot chapter for free, so you can get a taste of what’s to come. We hope you’ll enjoy it and buy and play the remaining chapters.

item.title: The Inner Descent VR
item.description:
About This Game

Step into "The Inner Descent", a VR horror-adventure game that delves deep into the realms of the subconscious, presenting a haunted forest echoing with the whispers of lurking shadows, a manifestation of fear and the unknown.

Your purpose in this wilderness is simple yet challenging: to escape. Your resources are symbolic keys, each color-coded to reflect different personal strides towards liberation. Venture through the forest and its enigmatic buildings, each room resonating with the echoes of your deepest fears and unresolved emotions.

"The Inner Descent" blends psychological horror with introspective storytelling, transcending traditional genre boundaries. It's more than just surviving; it's about understanding, evolving, and unearthing the secrets within. With a dynamic gameplay loop that changes with each playthrough, every journey into the forest is a new adventure.

Dare to step into the unknown, decipher the mysteries, and unlock your path to liberation. Will you survive The Inner Descent?

item.title: The Chronicles of Ezra Blackwell: Episode 1, Pappi's Peril
item.description:
About This Game

This is the first episode in the thrilling adventures of Ezra Blackwell. Fight, Flee, Farm, Hunt, Deal, and Drive in this adventure starring the super awesome and cool private investigator. Help Pappi's sons find him and discover what the evil corporation Syntech was hiding. This story has multiple endings so pay attention and check everything.

The is the first game ever made by this indie "developer". Fun gameplay is the main focus here. There is more to come in episodes 2-5!

item.title: Soul Sader
item.description:
About This Game

Soul Sader is a hardcore cross-scrolling RPG game.

You becomes the knight who notices the disaster that's coming.
A knight who has decided that his own power cannot prevent it wants to gain the power of other knights.
You can use the portal to get directly to where the knights are, but the other knights won't be obedient.

Each article has its own abilities and characteristics.
All you have to do is attack and avoid. But fighting won't be easy.
But you have the power of the soul, so you can continue to resurrect in the temple, and if you defeat the knight
you can equip soul and use new power.
You need energy when you use the power of a knight.
You get energy every time you succeed in an attack

Five knights are waiting for you.
Defeat all the knights and get the strength to stop the last disaster knight.


Controls

Movement can be done by pressing the left and right direction keys, and avoidance can be done by pressing the down direction keys along with the direction keys in the target direction.
To Equip the soul of the knight and use the power, you can use it by pressing Q when you have enough energy.

item.title: Heroine's Claw
item.description:
About This Game

Dive headfirst into a harrowing nightmare in "Heroine's Claw" a spine-tingling horror game that thrusts players into the heart of an otherworldly terror. In this immersive experience, a seemingly peaceful family inheritance quickly turns into a nightmarish trap set by a dangerous cult on a mysterious island. The once-believed refuge becomes a haunting ground for unspeakable evil, and only the bravest will survive.



Features:
- Thrilling Narrative: Unravel a gripping story as the desperate husband, on a mission to rescue his kidnapped family, delves into the dark secrets of the cursed island.

- Eerie Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a chilling atmosphere where malevolent shadows and supernatural entities lurk around every corner, creating an intense and suspenseful gaming experience.

- Cult Conspiracies: Navigate through the twisted machinations of a dangerous cult as you confront their sinister plans and attempt to destroy your family from the inside out.

- Puzzle Solving: Engage your intellect as you solve puzzles, unlocking the mysteries of the island and uncovering the true extent of the malevolence that plagues it.



We are very open to feedback and fixing any bugs reported by you to us! Please if you have any feedback or have any bug reports, send us an email through our contact us form on our website! Thank you so much for your support!

item.title: Rhythm Soccer
item.description:
About This Game

Step into the world of rhythm football and play with your favorite teams from Brazil, Argentina, Italy, and Germany! This amazing rhythm game is all about timing - hit the notes perfectly to pass the ball and score a goal. The cartoonish visuals add a fun twist to the gameplay, and the 15 manually synchronized songs will keep you entertained for hours. You can play friendly matches or compete in a tournament to become the ultimate rhythm football champion. This game was made with a lot of love by a solo developer and is now available on Steam. Download now and experience the excitement of rhythm football!

item.title: MageCraft
item.description:
About This Game

Magic Meets Strategy


MageCraft is all about using magic to outsmart enemies in close-quarters turn-based encounters. Stay behind cover and keep your foes at bay, while raining down a wide variety of spells to overcome the odds.

Discover Shadowy Secrets


Meet a team of young wizards at the beginning of their magical education. Apprenticed to the most powerful sorcerer known to history, but stalked by mysterious enemies. Hardly having even begun, these magicians will have to contend with unexpected enemies and insidious dark magic.

Build Your Spell Book


The main progression of MageCraft is in learning new spells for your team to wield in battle. Each wizard has their own specialization, and can gain increasingly powerful magic which they will need to take on the dangerous enemies the game presents. Balance the massive damage-dealing elemental magic with the strategic AoE nature spells or wield the power of time itself to give yourself an upper hand in combat! With many devastating spells available to acquire, you will always be finding new ways to outwit your enemy.

item.title: The Complex IV
item.description:
About This Game

The Complex IV is a role-playing game based on Dungeons & Dragons. Using a simplified subset of the SRD 5.1 ruleset, the game doesn't use aspects like class, race or gender. Instead, skills are used to determine what your character is good at. Characters can reach god-status at level 20.

Play on your own or with up to 5 other players online. Combine your skills or compete against each other - it's your choice.

item.title: Project Malice
item.description:
About This Game



The year is 213X. Earth has gone to s**t.

The infected roam the streets. They've killed everything you live for. Your kings have fled to the cosmos. Your gods have stopped answering your prayers. Your money is worthless. You have nowhere to go. Hunger and thirst begins to set in. There is no hope. Only pain and suffering.

But perhaps, amidst the chaos... you can find something to make your time worthwhile. This is where it all began... and this is where it will end. The future of humanity is in your hands.

OVERVIEW


Project Malice is an isometric third person shooter roguelike about a ruined Earth, and those who are unfortunate enough to dwell on it. What started off as just an uncontrollable outbreak of infection transformed into something far much worse.

FEATURES

  • A myriad of enemies, like a lot of enemies
  • Bosses that will curb stomp you to a pulp
  • Tons of random whatever to collect
  • Allies who are dumb enough to follow you around
  • Dialogue that lets you really get to know the characters
  • A bunch of secrets and extra challenges for you to walk past
  • Cameos from other games
  • Way too much lore

OTHER INFO


This game was originally created for Ludum Dare 49, which eventually spiraled into something much more. I wanted it to be an amalgamation of everything I've made up until this point, so the game contains a lot of references to my other games which take place in the same universe. It's possible you might need to play some of those if you would like to understand the full scope of the settings, characters, and story.

item.title: Kalyzmyr
item.description:
About This Game



Once the legendary warrior Smyrna, now long forgotten in the depths of Kalyzmyr. Break your chains and earn your freedom! Use your mighty axe and devastate your foes that keep you locked in Kalyzmyr!



Fight and defend through hordes of demons in this old-school fast-paced action game.
Each floor starts with a defense phase where you defend yourself from hordes of creatures by buying and upgrading defensive equipment. Kill monsters to earn money and experience. Level up your stats and skills, loot chests to level up your equipment using materials. Optimize your build to overcome challanges.



Randomized boons that can either boost your strength or weaken you.

Feeling weak? Or did you get unlucky? Break the door to turn back to the previous floor anytime. Farm lower levels and be prepared to face stronger opponents.

Unleash Your True Power
Unleash Smyrna’s true potential by activating ‘Berserk’ mode which allows you to attack at maximum speed for the duration.



Challange Bosses
You can challange boss of the current level by paying Crystals to the Mushroom King for extra materials.



Defeat three bosses and make your escape from the sunless dungeon Kalyzmyr.

item.title: Garbageman
item.description:
About This Game

Frank is a garbage man that's on a very important mission: he must keep the columns of the unstable Clock Building free of trash bags in order to prevent the building's imminent collapse. In this simple but fun arcade game, help Frank do his job and get a big score!

> Main features/characteristics:
- Simple gameplay;
- Score attack;
- Six columns to protect;
- Three kinds of presents to collect:
-> present 1: score points;
-> present 2: powerups (eg. gravity reduction, jump speed etc.);
-> present 3: special (trash bag magnet for up to 5 seconds).
- Retro-style graphics;
- High Score autosave.

item.title: LEZORUB
item.description:
About This Game

Is a captivating simulation and clicker game where players take on the persona of a proficient carpenter striving to survive in the wild. Their tasks include efficiently handling contracts, enhancing carpentry abilities, collecting valuable wood, and expanding their settlement by building new spaces and obtaining advanced tools. The overarching objective is to craft exquisite furniture pieces and thrive in this challenging setting.

Resource gathering involves collecting various types of wood, each with its own unique qualities and worth including oak, pine, mahogany, birch, and cedar. Different woods have different harvesting times, with more valuable ones taking longer to gather.
  • Players have the ability to craft furniture by utilizing various woods and crafting techniques to create personalized designs.
  • Base expansion includes the construction of additional buildings, which can be built using in-game currency. These buildings can include workshops, warehouses, and specialized facilities.

Features


  • The player must fulfill contracts with specific requirements, including wood type and furniture design.
  • Successful completion of contracts results in rewards, reputation, and experience points.
  • Seasonal or special event contracts provide exclusive rewards and furniture designs.
  • Carpentry skills are honed through points earned for completing contracts.
  • Skill upgrades unlock new furniture designs and base improvements.
  • Players can conduct research by investing money to unlock superior carpentry methods.
  • Advanced research yields permanent skill upgrades and bonuses.

item.title: Liquid Light
item.description:
About This Game

A relaxing 1bit puzzle game set in a world where all the light is liquid. There are all sorts of creatures in the darkness, waiting for the light to bring them form, but no need to worry, they are quite tame.

This puzzle game revolves around utilizing the liquid light and liquid dark to gain the curiosity and cooperation of the other creatures in the world. The Lightposts and Darkposts will be tools for your success, but with the help of the other creatures in the world, can you progress. While sometimes the creatures are covered in darkness and lack physical form, that can sometimes be advantageous as they no longer block the way. Sometimes though, you need a creature who's body is covered in light that allows it to take a physical form and help you cross gaps that would otherwise spell your doom.

This is a puzzle game inspired by the classic game Lode Runner, but capitalizing on the puzzle aspect and downplaying the franticness of the game. The Creatures in the world also feature incredibly simple AI so they always do exactly what you intend for them to do.

This game also features a level select which is accessible through the pause menu just in case you get hung up on one particular puzzle.

Complete with 8-bit sound effects and peculiar creatures, this game is certain to tickle your brain!

This game currently features:
- 1 Tutorial
- 16 Levels
- Five Creature variants
- Levers
- Two Lamppost Variants
- Light Platforms
- Also a home screen... because of course

item.title: Retro Run
item.description:
About This Game

Retro Run is an fast paced FPS platfromer, where you platform your way to the end goal, the runner energydrink!

Do everything in your power to get to the precious Runner energy drink! The game will take you through diffrent types of ''gamemodes'' that will be challenging their own way.
Platform your way thorugh the abyss in the platforms
And balance on the cars to try not to fall onto the street under you while enemies try to end you in Car Ride!

item.title: Edge Of Survival
item.description:
About This Game

Escape to a relaxing, survival sandbox surrounded by wildlife and nature. Scavenge materials and craft tools to turn your base
into a warm, well-supplied home. Survive by fishing, hunting, cooking, and growing your own food. Complete tasks in order to
maintain the forest running. but... be careful though, the forest is as dangerous as it is wonderful.

EXPLORE

Explore a living, colorful world, ranging from dense forests to dark caves.


GATHER, CRAFT and BUILD

There are hundreds of items that can be crafted and used for survival, from the simplest tools made of sticks and rocks to advanced Rifle,
improved armor, and tools. You can also
build a variety of workshops, from primitive leather dryers to pre-industrial era machines

GROW
Nurture delicate (and delicious) plants, Eat them raw or cook them for better nutritional values.

SURVIVE

Dangerous animals roam some areas of the forest. It's best to keep your distance if you can. Or simply upgrade your gear to fight them

item.title: Astra Strike
item.description:
About This Game

Astra Strike is a team-based first-person tactical shooter set in the near future. Players play as one agent In the main game mode, players are assigned to either the attacking or defending team with each team having five players on it. Players have abilities.

Every player starts each round with a "classic" pistol and four abilities. Other weapons and ability charges can be purchased using an in-game economic system that awards money based on the outcome of the round any kills the player is responsible for, and any objectives completed.

The game has an assortment of weapons including secondary guns like sidearms and primary guns like submachine guns, shotguns, assault rifles and sniper rifles. There are automatic and semi-automatic weapons that each have a unique shooting pattern that has to be controlled by the player to be able to shoot accurately.

● 1 Agent
● 2 Team-based gamemodes
● 6 Unique maps
● Exhaustively optimized for high frames-per-second gameplay.
● Proximity-based voice chat for real-time communication with friendlies
